{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 17), size = (550, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularLight", 28)], "itemHeight": 70 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default":(32,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(40,2),size=(35,60),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,2),size=(60,60),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(80,2),size=(430,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(530,2),size=(430,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(980,2),size=(200,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text=5),# selection, ],True,"showNever"), "notselected":(32,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(40,2),size=(35,60),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,2),size=(60,60),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(80,2),size=(430,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(530,2),size=(430,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos=(980,2),size=(200,60),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text=5),# selection, ],False,"showNever")}, "fonts":[gFont("Regular",24),gFont("Regular",24) ],"itemHeight":45}
